title: Progress of Mega Scale Development Projects by the end of First Quarter 2024
decision_details: - The Department of Project Management and Monitoring, having reviewed the performance related data and information submitted by the relevant Ministries pertaining to the financial and physical progress of the Mega Scale Development Projects being implemented by the Line Ministries by the end of First Quarter 2024, has submitted the Progress Report of the Mega Scale Developments Projects. According to the said Report, 171 Mega-Scale Development Projects are being implemented in the year 2024 and except 09 projects out of which, all other projects are planned to be completed by the end of the year 2026. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to complete the activities of 58 projects with more than 80% of physical progress in the year 2024 and to refer the currently suspended projects due to the lack of adequate provisions to the National Operations Room to carry out the necessary studies on the same prior to further investing on such projects, taking into consideration the necessity of completing the ongoing projects expeditiously so as to securing fiscal space for new capital projects, was approved by the Cabinet.
